directions: Place the water, ham,  green beans, potatoes, and onions into a large saucepan or soup pot, bring to a boil, and reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer until the ham and vegetables are very tender, about 45 minutes. Skim off any excess fat. Pour in the cream, season to taste with salt and pepper, and serve.
ingredients: 4 cups fresh green beans, trimmed and cut into 3/4-inch pieces
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
title: Creamy Green Bean Soup
